text:
Here’s the gentleman, very attractive!

Nikodim: “Poverty isn’t a vice, my friend.”  

Nikodim: “You explode easily, Raskolnikov!”  

Ilya: “What a regiment it was!”  

---

Raskolnikov: “Excuse me, Captain, can you understand?”  

Raskolnikov: “I’m a poor student, shattered by poverty.”  

Raskolnikov: “My landlady won’t even send dinner!”  

---

Head Clerk: “But that’s not our business, you know.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov, a struggling student, seeks understanding and forgiveness from others due to his dire financial situation and deteriorating circumstances.
